question: Oh no! Bianca Bug has scrambled our instructions! Can you help us fix the HTML so we can tell you how to stop Bianca Bug?
Bianca Bug has stolen our next app, and we need your help to get it back!
Here is a picture of Bianca Bug, so you'll know who to look for. <src = ''>
Once you catch her, bring us back the app, and we'll give you a reward!
